thread.title: Top 10 Portable Smartphone Chargers

title: Top 10 Portable Smartphone Chargers
text:
Top 10 Portable Smartphone Chargers Written by: Caroline Nolan 07/14/15 - 8:20 AM EDT 
NEW YORK (MainStreet) -- At one time or another, we have all watched helplessly as our cell phones shut down after using their last seconds of battery power. Panic hits as we wonder how to make an important phone call, send an urgent text or find directions. These days, we use our smartphones for many different purposes. Unfortunately, the number of hours we need to use our phones is often greater than the amount of battery power available on it. On days when we’re constantly on the move, finding a time or place to wait while our phones charge can seem impossible. 
Whether you’re packing for a vacation or heading off to work, a portable charger may be just what you need to keep your phone running. Here's a list of the top 10 portable smartphone chargers on Amazon.com. If you're an Amazon Prime member or thinking of becoming one, you might want to wait until tomorrow before buying.July 15 is Amazon's Prime Day , a one-day shopping event for new and existing Prime members. Deals will become available throughout the day and are expected to be even better than those offered on Black Friday. Take note of these items' prices today, and compare them with what you'll see on Prime Day. 
Click here to sign up for Amazon Prime . Customers who have never tried Amazon Prime can sign up for a 30-day free trial . More Headlines
